title: BBtor[BBtorrent}_v14_BlackberryApp_Full_with_key_thirdy69
description:
BBtor (BBtorrent) version: 1.4 FULL with Serial Key included!!!!
    - a BlackBerry torrent client downloader for Blackberry devices...



Implemented Features:


-Support magnet-links
-Support resume downloads 
-Support downloads of large files (over 2GB)
-Support UDP trackers(with BIS/BES should use udp proxy)
-Support MultiTracker torrents
-Registration of extensions ".torrent" and ".tor" in the Blackberry OS, allows you to open torrent files without starting the program
-Support multiple simultaneous download torrents
-Support all types of transport (GPRS/EDGE/3G/BES/BIS). Check your country and provider for blocking bittorrent protocol.
